name: Jumpjack by Jim Gerrie
description:
JUMPJACK - PUR 80

Can be played using the online emulator (use the same instructions above).  Select JUMPJACK.C10

Hit Enter to start game.  Move your character X to the top of the screen, avoiding arrows, and jump through the last opening.

Then a new level will begin.

Key input:

   W = Jump up

A     D = Left and Right
